Ava, Your AI Sales Engineer

As the lead product designer, I'm helping stakeholders and team members go from 0 to 1 by facilitating collaborative ideation sessions and rapid design iterations, visualizing how our AI would learns and validates knowledge, as well as specifying user flows and acceptance criteria for capabilities.

My process emphasizes user research and cross-functional team collaboration. I've learned to embrace ambiguity, turning it into something concrete based on evidence, cognitive psychology, and iterative feedback loops.

Problem solving begins with a 360-degree view - capturing business objectives, uncovering user pain points, mental models and workarounds, and identifying opportunities for differentiation. This foundation ensures solutions that drive both user satisfaction and business growth.

Continuous Discovery

Working closely with stakeholders and product and enginerring teams, findings and insights transform into user personas and guiding principles that align with business goals. Solutions emerge through rapid iteration and continuous user testing.

Leveraging cognitive psychology principles and UX patterns, design solutions evolve through early feedback and testing - moving from low-fidelity explorations to comprehensive designs while ensuring technical feasibility with engineering teams.

Partnering closely with engineering teams, delivery includes comprehensive design documentation that aligns with the product roadmap while balancing technical constraints with core user experience needs.

Post-deployment, impact is measured through usage data analysis and user interviews, emphasizing deep listening to uncover solution effectiveness and identify emerging needs that drive future improvements.

User Interviews

Continuous Discovery

Design principles serve as a compass, guiding designers toward meaningful solutions and tangible results. Here are my personal principles.

Simplicty always wins

Simplicity cuts through complexity and cognitive load, allowing users to intuitively achieve their goals without friction or confusion.

Consistency is an unsung hero

Consistency builds user trust by creating predictable patterns and behaviors that users can rely on across their entire experience.

Grow into the right solution

Start small, learn fast. Solutions evolve through quick iterations and real feedback. Focus on impact, not perfection.

No one is an island

Great solutions emerge from diverse perspectives, skills, and experiences coming together to challenge assumptions and create better outcomes.

Kind words from leaders and teammates
